QuestData.Title: Mawsworn Shackles
QuestData.Description:
<The shackles are part tangible, part ethereal. They scream into your mind when held.
Just the sort of thing Ve'nari might be looking for.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Mawsworn Shackles to Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText:
<Ve'nari snatches the shackles from your hands.>
Rather dangerous for a mortal such as yourself to be carrying these around.
<Ve'nari lifts and lowers the shackles slowly, as if to determine the weight.>
Though I must admit... these could prove useful.
